mapper.select: SELECT wp.param,wqi.param_value,wqp.alarm_max,wqp.alarm_min,wqp.chinese,wqp.curve_points,wqp.english,wqp.scope_max,wqp.scope_min,wqp.unit,wqi.gmt_create ,wi.id,wi.admin_id,wi.area,wi.location,wi.`use` ,ad.user_name FROM water_quality_param as wqp LEFT JOIN water_param as wp on wp.id=wqp.param_id LEFT JOIN water_quality_infor as wqi on wqi.param_id=wp.id LEFT JOIN water_information as wi on wi.id = wqi.waters_id LEFT JOIN user as ad on ad.id = wi.admin_id where wqi.waters_id = #{watersId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and wqi.param_id=#{paramId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY wqi.gmt_create desc limit 1
